title: bugs about torch.nn.BatchNorm1d
body_html:
🐛 Bug

when we use torch.nn.BatchNorm1d(), if our input batch_size=1, it not works

To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

m = nn.BatchNorm1d(100, affine=False)
input = torch.randn(1, 100)
output = m(input)
##ValueError: Expected more than 1 value per channel when training, got input size [1, 100]

if we change input = torch.randn(2, 100)
output = m(input)
will be OK

Expected behavior
